scripts.test-integration: (npx newman run ./tests/integration/Football_API_v2.json -e ./tests/integration/environments/gcloud.json) && (npx newman run ./tests/integration/Rugby_API_v2.json -e ./tests/integration/environments/gcloud.json) && (npx newman run ./tests/integration/Volleyball_API_v2.json -e ./tests/integration/environments/gcloud.json)
scripts.test: npm run test-integration && npm run test-e2e
scripts.posttest: kill `ps -uax | grep "node index" | grep -v "grep" | grep -v "sh" | awk '{print $2}'`
